text: Angel of the Lord 2 () is a 2016 Czech film. It was released in the Czech Republic by Falcon on 1 December 2016. The movie is available on Netflix with Czech audio and English subtitles.https://www.netflix.com/title/81192828 ==Reception== The film was number-one on its opening weekend in the Czech Republic, with . The film broke the box office record for a Czech film at US$4.9 million as of 6 February 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Czech films Category:Czech fantasy films Category:Czech children's films Category:Czech comedy films Category:Czech sequel films
title: Angel of the Lord 2
